metadata.title: CVE-2020-13558 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
A code execution vulnerability exists in the AudioSourceProviderGStreamerfunctionality of Webkit WebKitGTK 2.30.1. A specially crafted web page canlead to a use after free.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13558` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.30.5
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.30.5
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.30.5
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.30.5
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.30.5
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.30.5
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.30.5
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.30.5
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.30.5
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.30.5
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.30.5
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.30.5
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.30.5
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.30.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.30.5').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
